descriptionHtml:
This is a RaceMenu Preset of my shy DarkElf, called Glacies.
The last piece of my "All Races minus Beast" - preset collection.

[b]Mods I use for him:[/b]

Body: [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SoS [/url] with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Body Textures for Better Males and SoS[/url]
Face: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]

Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url] -> for the bright haircolor I added this mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88254]Smooth Silky Straight KS Hairdo's Retexture[/url]
Brows: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]
Eyes: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88506?]Elegant Beauty Stunning Eyes Remastered[/url]﻿


[b]Armors I used in the screenshots: [/b](pics from left to right)

Fur Poncho from FurArmorSet (keungkeung)
Silverlight Armor by RefurbMadness (not available atm)
Vilhelm Armor from the Dark Souls Pack by Team Tal


Hope you like him! :)
author: Thrwomp
